meaningMnemonic: It's such a <kanji>leisure</kanji>ly day that everyone has <kanji>scatter</kanji>ed and left the area <vocabulary>deserted</vocabulary>. It's just you now. Lounging in the shade.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
